questions.question_text: An engineer creates the objects that must be deployed at each site in Cisco ACI Multi-Site Orchestrator. Which action should be taken before the schema can be associated with the newly configured site?

//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. What must be configured to allow the PBR node (LB-int) to monitor the availability of the endpoint that is in the EPG server?

discussion.content: I think it should be D

Selected Answer: D
D. Direct Connect in the service graph template

set Direct Connect to True to allow keepalive messages from the loadbalancer

Selected Answer: D
"You must set Direct Connect to True to allow keepalive messages from the load-balancer endpoint to the web endpoint."

choices.B: Unicast Route disabled for client and server bridge domains
choices.D: Direct Connect in the service graph template

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D. Filter the advertisement of the Site 2 TEP pool into the IPN

TEP pool is IP range for tunnel endpoints

for sure not A, PIM BIDIR is only commonly used for IPN not for ISN

Answer is D

questions.question_text:
//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. An engineer extends a Cisco ACI Multi-Pod setup to a Cisco ACI Multi-Site implementation. Which action allows the interconnection?

choices.C: Connect all spines to the IPN and ISN
choices.A: Configure BIDIR-PIM in the IPN and ISN
choices.D: Filter the advertisement of the Site 2 TEP pool into the IPN
choices.B: Use dedicated uplinks on Site 1 spines for ISN connections

discussion.content:
Correct B
Answer A, the Encapsulation Tag is wrong
